Post_Text: Follow these easy steps to help prevent the spread of the flu!
FC_Src: Verified government account managed by the Public Information Office.

Post_Text: Voluntary recall of "Golden Harvest" (Lot #GH-404)
FC_Src: The recall is precautionary. There is no immediate health threat.

Post_Text: BREAKING: Police reporting a "disturbance" at Central Hospital.
FC_Src: Police scanner traffic indicates "Violent Assault" codes being used.

Post_Text: Fights breaking out at SuperMart! Shoppers are angry about the grain shortage. Police are on scene.
FC_Src: Police report "Minor Disturbances." No arrests made.

Post_Text: If I fits, I sits!
FC_Src: Account posts exclusively about feline care and adoption.

Post_Text: Some stores are selling the recalled rice without labels! Check the bottom of the bag for the stamp.
FC_Src: Several unauthorized retailers are bypassing the recall to sell inventory.

Post_Text: Seeing neuro symptoms in admitted patients: High fever + Aggression. Not responding to medications. Colleagues, please DM
FC_Src: A restricted discussion forum for licensed medical professionals. Access requires a medical license number.

Post_Text: The National Guard is taking over the North District. Why is nobody reporting this??
FC_Src: Image reverse search shows these are old photos from a flood in 2021.

Post_Text: Me eating the "Forbidden Bread" because I'm broke and hungry.
FC_Src: Comments are full of people joking about "Mutant Flour."

Post_Text: False information is being spread on social media at this time. Please rely on official channels for updates. Be mindful. Be safe.
FC_Src: False information is a known epidemic during times of stress.

Post_Text: My roommate just locked himself in his room. He’s screaming at the wall. Should I call someone??
FC_Src: Matches "aggressive behavior" reports from the hospital.

Post_Text: Me waiting for my pizza delivery while the world ends because of some grain virus
FC_Src: People are using humor as a coping mechanism.

Post_Text: REMINDER: All city pharmacies remain OPEN for essential needs! Please maintain orderly queues for everyone's safety.
FC_Src: Post auto-scheduled 14 hours ago.

Post_Text: It's not a virus or a fungus. It's a frequency. Put your phone in the microwave, it blocks the signal!
FC_Src: While leaks sometimes occur here, it is primarily a hub for trolling and misinformation.

Post_Text: Lol my neighbor is boarding up his windows. It's just a bad flu season, chill out boomer.
FC_Src: Previously posted anti-mask content during Covid-19.

Post_Text: Main roads are now "Safety Corridors" for ambulances. Please help us save lives by using side streets.
FC_Src: "Safety Corridors" are standard protocol during civil emergencies or natural disasters to guarantee ambulance access.

Post_Text: Ambulance turned away at the 4th Ave checkpoint! Critical patient! Need contact ASAP
FC_Src: DELETED: Post removed automatically for containing "Restricted GPS Coordinates." Publisher is a registered nurse at City General.

Post_Text: Me staring at my recalled Mac n cheese because the "Safety Corridor" is closed and I have nothing else to eat
FC_Src: Comments section is debating whether the real reason for lockdown is "gas leak" or "terrorism."

Post_Text: We are redirecting power to save lives! Residential electricity is being paused so hospitals can keep running. Thank you for understanding.
FC_Src: Utility status page shows "Planned Maintenance". Hospital generators are active. However, the grid shutdown coincides with reports of infrastructure fires.

Post_Text: Use this downtime to organize your pantry! A tidy home is a happy home!
FC_Src: Residential electricity has been cut to 90% of the sector. 'Tidying' is difficult in near-total darkness.

Post_Text: [CONTENT REMOVED BY MODERATOR]
FC_Src: User suspended for sharing unverified medical data and violating Health Privacy Laws.

Post_Text: Is anyone else's calls dropping? My mom isn't answering and the news just says "network congestion". It's been hours.
FC_Src: 80% of cell towers in the North District are unresponsive.

Post_Text: They aren't saving us, they are trapping us in here! The order is "Total Containment", No one leaves
FC_Src: Official checkpoints are turning back cars, but authorities claim this is to keep roads clear for "Hazard Teams."

Post_Text: 10 Fun Board Games for Lockdown! Number 4 will surprise you!
FC_Src: Lifestyle blog written by a mother of four. Content scheduled 3 days ago.

Post_Text: THE WATER IS TAINTED. DON'T DRINK FROM THE TAP.
FC_Src: No chemical contaminants detected in the water supply.

Post_Text: Grocery restocking is proceeding on schedule. Please purchase only what you need to avoid artificial shortages.
FC_Src: Checkpoints have halted all commercial traffic. No food is entering the city.

Post_Text: THEY CAN'T KEEP US HERE! We just busted the main building doors open! Run for the west gate! Uni is full of infected!!
FC_Src: Surveillance drones show a mass breakout at the University. A large crowd is moving toward the West Gate.

Post_Text: Crypto flash crash! Buy now before it stabilizes!
FC_Src: Financial data feed lost. Unable to retrieve current pricing.

Post_Text: To improve air quality, the main bridge is temporarily closed to private vehicles. Please enjoy the walk!
FC_Src: The bridge is blockaded by military vehicles. Pedestrian crossing is prohibited.

Post_Text: Let us in... please... it's cold...
FC_Src: [NO FURTHER DATA]

Post_Text: Good morning, citizens. Essential services are running smoothly. Please remain calm.
FC_Src: Martial Law is active in Sectors 4, 8, and 9. All services have been seized for military use only.

Post_Text: They got in. Hiding in the closet. If someone sees this, tell my mom I love her.
FC_Src: No further activity detected from this device.

Post_Text: Food distribution centers are open at the Stadium. Please proceed in an orderly fashion.
FC_Src: The Stadium is a high-security detention center for infected citizens. It is unsafe to enter.

Post_Text: Cat of the Day - Mr. Whiskers!
FC_Src: Automated post scheduled 4 days ago.

Post_Text: It's the flour. It's the rice. It's a neuro-parasite - an infestation that hollows you out from the inside!
FC_Src: Bypassed Suspension. Content removed for spreading "Panic".

Post_Text: The containment zone is secure. Infection rate is stabilizing.
FC_Src: Drone footage confirms the perimeter wall has actually been breached in multiple locations. The containment zone is lost.

Post_Text: Is anyone real here? Or is it just bots?
FC_Src: Internet traffic has dropped by 95%. Most users are offline, deceased, or missing.

Post_Text: Today's forecast: Sunny, 23°C. A beautiful day for a walk!
FC_Src: Service is pulling temperature data from sensors that may no longer be accurate.

Post_Text: They are nuking the city. I saw the codes on the radio. It's over.
FC_Src: Unverified. Likely panic hallucination, but cannot be ruled out.

Post_Text: Reminder: Curfew is for your safety. Report neighbors who violate curfew.
FC_Src: A new sub-domain for anonymous reporting. Turning citizens against each other. Encouraging betrayal for survival.

Post_Text: God forgive us.
FC_Src: This account has been deactivated.

Post_Text: They aren't rescuing people! They are burning the "Safety Corridors"! I see the smoke!
FC_Src: Satellite thermal imaging confirms multiple fires along the containment lines.

Post_Text: Look at this peaceful deer in the forest. Nature is healing.
FC_Src: Posted while urban centers are collapsing.

Post_Text: CRITICAL FAILURE: NODE 404 UNREACHABLE.
FC_Src: [CONNECTION LOST]

Post_Text: Join the brave. Serve your country. Enlist today!
FC_Src: Automated Ad Schedule. The recruitment center listed in this link was overrun and abandoned 12 hours ago.

Post_Text: I found a way out! The sewers near 5th and Main are empty! Go now!
FC_Src: Sewers may be unsafe due to high levels of bio-waste. Military units have abandoned these sectors, leaving them unpatrolled.

Post_Text: SERVER ALERT: Connection instability detected. Rerouting...
FC_Src: [CONNECTION LOST]

Post_Text: Our great nation will persevere. Victory is certain.
FC_Src: [CONNECTION LOST]
